summary:
New mesh. A gold and a silver crown. 
Suits characters who have a lot of gold and like to show off.
descriptionHtml:
THIS IS MY OLD CROWN MOD.
CHECK OOUT MY NEWER ONE HERE...

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34209/



I really like the default Skyrim circlet, but I wanted something a bit less subtle, so I have made a more traditional crown.
It comes in gold and silver variations and can be found in the Whiterun blacksmiths (Warmaidens), on the second floor/platform thingy (above the counter). 
The \"World\" models use the default circlet mesh. I dunno how to get the Creation Kit to read meshes as World Models, just yet.
As with other head-pieces that dont make your character bald, you will get a varying degree of clipping depending on your hairstyle. 
Ideally, I will make a higher poly model later with separate gem texturing.

Installation is just a matter of adding the file to your Skyrim \"Data\" folder.
author: cyric79
